message.content:
I need to identify the specific line item and value that represents the amount of profit the entity retains after all expenses have been deducted from total revenue.

In a cash flow statement, this value is typically represented by the "Net Profit" line item, which shows the final profit figure after accounting for all operational expenses, interest, taxes, etc.

Looking at the cash flow statement provided:

I can see the "Net Profit" line item under "Cash Flow From Operating Activities" section with a value of 1103190.60 on 2024-01-28.

This is the amount of profit the entity has retained after all expenses have been deducted from the total revenue.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '1103190.60'}}
```
